text: Kepler-20g is a non-transiting exoplanet orbiting Kepler-20. Its radius is about twice that of Earth, with a minimum mass Earth masses. Kepler-20g was announced on 24 August 2016. ==References== Category:Exoplanets discovered in 2016 Category:Exoplanets detected by radial velocity G Category:Lyra (constellation)
title: Kepler-20g
